query.statement: UPDATE FMM_SINGLE_MENU_MST SET MENU_NAME = #MENU_NAME# , MENU_CLASS = #MENU_CLASS# , COST_TYPE = #COST_TYPE# , PHOTO_TITLE_1 = #PHOTO_TITLE_1# , PHOTO_PATH_1 = #PHOTO_PATH_1# , SPHOTO_PATH_1 = #SPHOTO_PATH_1# , PHOTO_TITLE_2 = #PHOTO_TITLE_2# , PHOTO_PATH_2 = #PHOTO_PATH_2# , SPHOTO_PATH_2 = #SPHOTO_PATH_2# , UUSER = #g_EmpNo# , UDATE = SYSDATE WHERE SINGLE_MENU_CD = #SINGLE_MENU_CD#
